Hello,

You have reached the coding page.
This is a list of scripts I wrote for InDesign, After Effects and Illustrator and some programs in processing, Java and C++. They are mostly hosted on github.com or aescripts.com. So you will be redirected to the repositories or github pages.

Scripts


Take a look into the results of the workshop "Typography & Automation" @ University of Applied Siences Potsdam ;-⟩.

AE

  • AEMap.jsx creating maps in After Effects
  • Locations.jsx create 2D and 3D geo located markers on an equirectangular map or projected onto a sphere
  • OBJ Vertex Export Export wavefront OBJ vertex point clouds from After Effects layer positions.
  • Swissd is an After Effects script for creating fixed width text layouts
  • The-Geo-Beast.jsx creating georeferenced graphics in After Effects (not yet released)
  • wihihihiggle.jsx quickly apply wiggle to selected properties
  • Timeremap Source keeps your compositions clean by stacking and precomposing multiple layers

ID

  • Typography & Automation a workshop @ University of Applied Siences Potsdam ;-⟩
  • Auto Typo Wiki a wiki on writing JavaScript for InDesign
  • Batch Find And Replace a tiny script that batch processes find change queries
  • theGrids Some scripts for a InDesign scripting workshop I gave @ FHP
  • Typo Standard Some scripts for a InDesign scripting workshop I gave @ FHP
  • Next Typo Standard Some scripts for a InDesign scripting workshop I gave @ FHP
  • IDJSMap Creat a equirectangular projected map in ID CS4+
  • IncomOrg2Layout This is some code that generates indesign documents from json data taken from incom.org
  • IDSnippets a loos collection of InDesign Scripts.
  • MPO Launcher Scripts the scripts used in the ID CS 4 plugin MPO Launcher

AI

  • Illustrator Voronoi An Adobe Illustrator Javascript implementation of gorhills implementation of Fortune's algorithm to compute Voronoi cells
  • Connected Nodes in Illustrator create points and connect them based on their distance

Sublime Text

  • Sublime-open-url a tiny plugin that opens a selected url in a new browser window

Programms


Java and Processing

  • UElaerm A MS surface multitouch project for exploring the effect of noise in urban layers. The code is at google code
  • Tangible Maps an outline for desaster managment system on multitouch tables. Developed at the Maeve table
  • Connected Nodes processing create points and connect them based on their distance

C++

  • MPO Launcher an InDesign CS4 Plugin for running a defined set of scripts

This site is generated with gh-pages, jekyll and twitter bootstrap by fabiantheblind.
Get the source files over here. Oh. I almost forgot that boring legal stuff called impressum.
